channel.title: AI Freedom Stack
channel.description: Recent content on AI Freedom Stack

item.title: Cursor
item.description:
What is Cursor?

Cursor is a code editor built on top of VS Code that puts AI at the center of your coding workflow. Instead of switching between your editor and ChatGPT, you talk to your codebase directly. Ask it to build features, fix bugs, or refactor ‚Äî and it does it with full context of your project.

Who is it for?

  • Best for: Solo developers and non-technical founders building MVPs, web apps, or automations
  • Not for: Teams with strict code review processes who need predictable, auditable changes
  • Solo builder score: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê (5/5)

What does it cost?

Plan Price What You Get
Free $0 50 slow AI requests/day, basic autocomplete
Pro $20/mo 500 fast requests/day, GPT-4 + Claude access
Business $40/mo Team features, admin controls

Hidden costs: The free tier is genuinely usable but you’ll hit the limit fast on a real project.

item.title: ElevenLabs
item.description:
What is ElevenLabs?

ElevenLabs is a text-to-speech platform that generates voices nearly indistinguishable from real humans. Upload a script, pick a voice (or clone your own), and get broadcast-quality audio back in seconds.

Who is it for?

  • Best for: YouTube creators, podcasters, audiobook producers, anyone who needs voice content at scale
  • Not for: Live conversation or real-time voice chat applications
  • Solo builder score: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚òÜ (4/5)

What does it cost?

Plan Price What You Get
Free $0 10k characters/month, 3 voices
Starter $5/mo 30k characters, 10 voices
Creator $22/mo 100k characters, voice cloning
Pro $99/mo 500k characters, 4hrs dubbing

Hidden costs: Characters burn fast on long-form content. A 10-minute video script uses ~10-15k characters.

item.title: Week 1: The Tools That Actually Matter Right Now
item.description:
Welcome to the first weekly roundup from AI Freedom Stack.

Every week, we cut through the noise and surface the AI tools and updates that actually matter if you’re building solo. No hype. No “top 100 AI tools” listicles. Just what’s useful, what’s not, and what you should pay attention to.

üî• The Headline: Kimi K2.5’s Agent Swarm

A Beijing-based company called Moonshot AI quietly released a model called Kimi K2.5, and its standout feature ‚Äî Agent Swarm ‚Äî is genuinely unlike anything else available right now.

item.title: Bolt.new
item.description:
What is Bolt.new?

Bolt.new lets you describe a web application in plain English and builds it for you in the browser ‚Äî frontend, backend, database, and deployment included. No terminal. No setup. You describe, it builds, you ship.

Who is it for?

  • Best for: Non-technical entrepreneurs who need MVPs, landing pages, or internal tools fast
  • Not for: Complex applications that need custom infrastructure or specific performance requirements
  • Solo builder score: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚òÜ (4/5)

What does it cost?

Plan Price What You Get
Free $0 Limited generations per day
Pro $20/mo Unlimited generations, deployment

Free tier reality check: Enough to test it. You’ll need Pro to build anything real.
